name: Shoot Thy Cop
description:
Shoot Thy Cop is game about being some dude that goes around killing the police, the point of the game is to get the highest score that you can get, keep in mind, it will inevitably have bugs, below this text, are some answers to some questions.

WHY DID YOU MAKE THIS

Welp, simply i watched some video (Link here:Click here), needless to say, two of the three games the developers made in the video were scams, and i was like "Could i do a better job?", and as such, this monstruosity was born.

ENGINE USED TO MAKE THIS

The answer to this one is Gamemaker Studio 2, specifically using the DND coding (Yes, i am dumb).

HOW WERE THE SPRITES MADE

Using Aseprite... Is this really needed?

WHAT ARE THE CONTROLS

WS to move fowards or backwards

1 and 2 to equip/unequip gun (Its useless)

Space to shoot

Shift for a dash
